Thank you for registering your interest!
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for submitting your interest to join Step Forward in September 2016. We are currently busy preparing for this cohort but we'll be opening applications in September. In the meantime, here is a reminder of what you can gain on with Step Forward:
12 months of full time work with a high quality employer received a salary of £9,000 a nationally recognised qualification equivalent to an A-level an opportunity to develop essential skills that employers look for such as teamwork, leadership and problem solving receive support from your own professional mentor to get the most of the year and beyond a shared experiences with other like minded people and form lasting friendships​
Applications will open in September 2015. But for now like us on facebook and follow us on twitter to be kept up to date with the latest information. Best wishes
Step Forward
